divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east of Porter,Ohio(southeastern Ohio) on state route 554 at approximately 230-300PM on Sunday,3rd of Feb. It was a cloudy day and sun hitting clouds directly in front of me and something caught my eye(like a movement different from the clouds) to where I slowed and tried to see it better. The clouds were low and colored from light to dark and I seen a blue blimp looking craft,not extremely high altitude it seemed. It seemed to be big,like a blimp and moved at a fairly good speed right amongst the clouds going from west to east in a straight line. I had a car behind me ,so I had to look at the road and drive,but it did not really fit,that it moved steady and at a good speed,but was not like a plane and was right in the rain clouds. I must admit,I just couldn't make a definite identification that quick,but as a few days went by,it just keeps sticking in my mind that it was out of place compared to anything I ever seen. It was light blue,but as it went in front of darker clouds ,it stood out from the background. I was just curious if any reports by others from my area have been reported.
Summary: driving east on st.rt. 554,seen blue blimp shaped object in clouds moving west to east
